Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction.Interactioner

  • Packages that use Interactioner 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.enums
    Contains all enumerations of some chart options where only a specific set of values can be set.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction
    Contains all classes to implement a custom interactions for CHART.JS.

    • Uses of Interactioner in org.pepstock.charba.client.enums

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.enums that implement Interactioner 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultInteractionMode
      When configuring interaction with the graph via hover or tooltips, a number of different modes are available to set which elements appear via tooltip or hover.

    • Uses of Interactioner in org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction that implement Interactioner 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractInteractioner
      Abstract class which implements a interactioner.
      It helps to create a custom interactioner, creating a custom interaction mode using the name as string passed as argument.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction that return Interactioner 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Interactioner Interactions.createExtendedInteractioner​(String mode, ExtendedInteraction interation)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a native function already existing in java script code.
      Interactioner Interactions.createExtendedInteractioner​(String mode, ExtendedInteraction interation, boolean register)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a native function already existing in java script code.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, String code)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a string which represents the java script code, to implement the new interaction mode.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, String code, boolean register)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a string which represents the java script code, to implement the new interaction mode.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, NativeInteraction callback)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a NativeInteraction which represents the java script function, to implement the new interaction mode.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, NativeInteraction callback, boolean register)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a NativeInteraction which represents the java script function, to implement the new interaction mode.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, AbstractInjectableResource code)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a resource where the java script code, to implement the new interaction mode, is stored.
      Interactioner Interactions.createNativeInteractioner​(String mode, AbstractInjectableResource code, boolean register)
      Creates a Interactioner for a specific mode, passed as argument, and a resource where the java script code, to implement the new interaction mode, is stored.
      Interactioner Interactions.getInteractioner​(IsInteractionMode mode)
      Returns the interactioner.
      If not exists, returns null.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction with parameters of type Interactioner 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean Interactioner.isValid​(Interactioner interactioner)
      Returns true if interactioner passed as argument is not null and its mode is not null as well.
      void Interactions.register​(Interactioner interactioner)
      Register the interaction mode to CHART.JS.
      void Interactions.unregister​(Interactioner interactioner)
      Unregister the custom interaction mode to CHART.JS.
